features: 【Efficient Cleaning】This heavy-duty broom is designed to effectively sweep, dust, and debris from various surfaces, including floors, garages, patios, gardens, kitchens, and more.

【Durable and Lightweight】Made with quality materials, this indoor broom is built to last and can withstand heavy use. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable and non-tiring use even for extended periods.
【Versatile Angle Broom】The angle broom feature allows for easy access to hard-to-reach areas, ensuring thorough cleaning in every corner of your space.

【Safe and Gentle:】The brooms bristles are designed to be gentle on surfaces while still providing excellent cleaning performance. It wont scratch or damage floors, making it suitable for use on various floor types.
【Convenient Storage】The outside broom handle features a perforated design, allowing for easy hanging and storage when not in use. Keep your space tidy and organized with this practical cleaning tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best part is that it's long. We've already used it to reach a bunch of places we would have needed a (at least a short) ladder to get to before. So that part is awesome.It's also interesting to get a broomstick in the mail because it's been designed to be put together.I'd suggest putting a light glue on the threads of each segment because it kept coming loose. Plumbers tape would be another option - anything to make it stay.Otherwise, it's just okay. I considered giving it 4 stars, but it's also cheap so taking the price into consideration I think it's a really good deal. I've also used some other mail type brooms and this was the best of them. None of the others would rate a 5 even if they were half the price.So, it's not like the best broom, but it's worth the price if you have need of a long broom and want it delivered to you, or if you need to disassemble to save space or something.
